body.para: I've been reviewing weekely reports I have 1 campaign, 8 adgroups and approx 100 keywords. By increasing my bids per keyword, I've been able to see via Google Keyword reports that my individual keyword positions have increased to 90% of all of the words are showing up between 1 and 4 position. My CTR is not that great. My daily budget is $25. Usually, by 10:00 am in the morning we're at ~$16.00 with $9 left in the budget. It's at this time that I start testing searches by hand to see where we are showing up. Frankly, my ads for any of the keywords show up... no matter how many times I search on a keyword that supposedly shows up on the average in 1st position.
Am I being mislead by the reports or am I making a basic error somewhere in my execution of a campaign?
